html: (2 Nephi 8:7)."Fear ye not the reproach of men." In our day the Lord counseled those involved in His work: "And your whole labor shall be in Zion, with all your soul, from henceforth; yea, you shall ever open your mouth in my cause, not fearing what man can do, for I am with you. Amen." (D&C 30:11.) Proverbs sums it up with these words: "The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe." (Proverbs 29:25.)
